t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    x = input()
    unique = set(x)
    list1 = list(unique)
    for j in unique:
        count = x.count(j)
        if count % 2 != 0:
            print('NO')
            break
        elif j == list1[-1]:
            print('YES')
            break
